attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Union Terrace gardens is a historical part of Aberdeen. It is one of the few parts within the city with grass. It has beautiful old trees and is surrounded by nice architecture - no new build rubbish. one group wants to make it an arts centre. one group wants to modernise it into what looks like a concrete square with shops, and will cost around 400 million. I want to leave it as it is. Please join me

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
